Target is MonoBehaviour 616327993 on GameObject 616327987 using script guid 0cd44c1031e13a943bb63640046fad76 (UnityEngine.UI.CanvasScaler). Scene settings: uiScaleMode=ConstantPixelSize(0), referencePixelsPerUnit=100, scaleFactor=1, referenceResolution=800x600, screenMatchMode=MatchWidthOrHeight(0), matchWidthOrHeight=0, physicalUnit=Points(3), fallbackScreenDPI=96, defaultSpriteDPI=96, dynamicPixelsPerUnit=1, presetInfoIsWorld=true. CanvasScaler automatically executes Handle()/HandleWorldCanvas in OnEnable and via Canvas.preWillRenderCanvases when it is a root Canvas in World Space; no 'm_Calls' UnityEvents are serialized for this component. This trigger step represents waiting a frame to observe the automatic scaling effects (Canvas.scaleFactor and Canvas.referencePixelsPerUnit) under the configured world-space preset.
